our_mission_description: At Evergreen, we’re dedicated to making it easy for you to upgrade your tech while contributing to a sustainable future. Our mission is to provide a simple, reliable, and rewarding mobile trade-in experience that benefits both our customers and the planet.
our_values_description: Here’s why we stand out in the mobile trade-in industry.

values.expertise_description: Apple, Samsung, and Google certified, you can trust our expert technicians with your device and privacy.
values.quality_description: Our phones undergo a 64-point inspection to ensure they function like new. Plus, they’re backed by a 1-year warranty*.
values.sustainability_description: Buying a certified pre-owned phone keeps devices out of landfills and reduces carbon emissions.

why_trade_in_title: Why Trade In Your Mobile Device?
why_trade_in_description: Upgrading to a new phone shouldn't mean that your old device goes to waste. By trading in your mobile with us, you’re helping to reduce electronic waste and support a circular economy.

how_it_works_steps.step1: Get an Instant Quote: Enter your device details to see its worth.
how_it_works_steps.step2: Send Your Device: We provide a free shipping label for a hassle-free send-off.
how_it_works_steps.step3: Get Paid: Once we receive and verify your device, you’ll get paid quickly.

join_us_description: Together, we can reduce our environmental footprint. Every trade-in makes a difference. Thank you for choosing Evergreen Wireless and helping us work towards a more sustainable future!
